long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Hunter is a powerful Google Chrome extension designed to enhance your job hunting experience on Upwork. By replacing your default start page, this extension provides you with quick and convenient access to up-to-date job listings on Upwork using the power of RSS feeds. The extension replaces the default new tab.

With Upwork Hunter, finding new job opportunities on Upwork has never been easier. Instead of manually searching through countless pages and categories, this extension brings relevant job listings right to your browser. By leveraging RSS technology, it automatically aggregates the latest job postings from Upwork and presents them in a user-friendly format.

Additionally, Upwork Hunter integrates ChatGPT, a powerful language model, to offer advanced chat-based functionalities for developers. With ChatGPT, you can generate professional cover letters, craft compelling profile summaries, compose effective chat responses, and engage in generic Q&A sessions.

Take advantage of the built-in note-taking feature to keep track of important information related to job applications, client communication, and more.

Upwork Hunter is an open source project, encouraging collaboration and contributions from the developer community. Join us in improving and expanding the functionality of this essential tool for Upwork freelancers.

Key Features:

- Streamlined Job Search: Save time and effort with real-time updates on job opportunities.
- Personalized Notifications: Stay informed about relevant job listings based on your preferences.
- Efficient RSS Integration: Seamlessly track new job postings across categories and industries.
- Intuitive Interface: Enjoy a clean and easy-to-use browsing experience, with direct application access.
- ChatGPT Integration: Leverage the power of ChatGPT for generating cover letters, profile summaries, chat responses, and engaging in Q&A sessions.
- Note-Taking: Keep track of important information related to job applications and client communication.

Discover your dream projects with ease using Upwork Hunter, the essential open source tool for Upwork freelancers.
